direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods match elements based on text patterns but differ in whether they include descendant text.
Both methods search for elements containing specific text, but one uses a pattern and the other a literal string.
Both methods search for elements containing specific text, but one uses a pattern and the other a literal string, and they differ in whether they include descendant text.
Both methods can be used to select elements based on text criteria, but 'select' uses CSS selectors while 'getElementsMatchingText' uses a regular expression.
Both methods can be used to select elements based on custom criteria, but 'select' uses an Evaluator while 'getElementsMatchingText' uses a regular expression.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
